mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO, UPLOADER, SELL_STATUS, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, "DESCRIPTION", "OPTION", "P_TAG", TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "CREATE_DATE", TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "MODIFY_DATE", SELLER_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM "PRODUCT" P JOIN SELLER ON (UPLOADER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND SELL_STATUS = '판매중' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, UPLOADER, SELL_STATUS, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, "DESCRIPTION", "OPTION", "P_TAG", TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "CREATE_DATE", TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "MODIFY_DATE", SELLER_NAME, SELLER_BRN, SELLER_PHONE, SELLER_LOCATION, SELLER_INTRO, SELLER_IMAGEPATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM PRODUCT JOIN SELLER ON (UPLOADER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT REVIEW_NO ,USER_ID ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,SCORE ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "CREATE_DATE" ,CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER ON (REVIEW_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (REVIEW_NO = REF_RNO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_PNO = #{productNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO ,USER_ID ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,SCORE ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "CREATE_DATE" ,CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER ON (REVIEW_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (REVIEW_NO = REF_RNO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW_WRITER = #{userNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
